item.title: A request from SJO
item.description:
I received a message forwarded by SJO, signed by the director. It is a request for Polish students to help a research.

Please remember that 

(1) I do not know this person (Alisa Borkowska) and I do not like the fact that she doesn't have a professional e-mail address;

(2) I cannot guarantee that it is not a phishing mail;

(3) the participation to this questionary is not part of our Japanese course, and it is not obligatory.

I copied below the entire e-mail forwarded by the director of SJO. As you can see, the director doesn't know this person, and there is no credential presented (a research at which institution, etc.). Personally I wouldn't touch this kind of e-mail, BUT I'm obliged by SJO to pass this information to you. If you can ignore all the warning signs of phishing mail, and if you'd like to help this "research," please feel free to use the link in the e-mail.

==============

Szanowna Pani Magister ( <= referring to the director of SJO)

Chciałabym zwrócić się z prośbą o wsparcie w badaniach naukowych. Mam kontakt do Pani od Pani Profesor Iriny Modrzyckiej, z którą miałam przyjemność rozmawiać się na konferencji. Piszę rozprawę doktorką pod tytułem "Koncepty wartości w językach polskim i ukraińskim oraz ich rola w komunikacji międzykulturowej", w związku z czym przeprowadzam ankietę wśród studentów polskojęzycznych oraz ukraińskojęzycznych. Zależy mi na wynikach zróżnicowanych pod względem terytorialnym, dla tego chce poprosić o rozprzestrzenienie mojej ankiety wśród studentów.

link do ankiety: https://www.survio.com/survey/d/C0S6F8I0P2H9B8S7X

Bardzo proszę o odpowiedź czy będzie to możliwe.

Z poważaniem

Alisa Borkowska  (alisa.borkowska@gmail.com)

item.title: About Absence (FAQ)
item.description:
In the past, I received some inqueries concerning "absence." I assembled here the basic information to answer most frequently asked questions: 

  1. Students have the obligation to attend the lecture;
  2. Students have the right to miss 2 lessons for the 45-hour course, 3 lessons for the 60-hour course, without excuse;
  3. If you are ill or have to go away because of study-related business, with the presentation of the proof, your absence will be excused;
  4. Other reasons do not constitute the reason for your absence;
  5. Even with excuse, the number of your absence must not exceed 10.

When you are absent because of your work or some urgent personal matter, I said I will consider the circumstance of your absence, BUT it will be still counted as “absence.” Please remember the item (1) above.
